mapper.update: update WEBPORTAL_IMAGE set NAME=#{name}, DICTIONARY_ID=#{dictionaryId}, PURPOSE=#{purpose}, URL=#{url}, TAG=#{tag}, ISUSED=#{isUsed}, DESCN=#{descn}, UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser}, UPDATE_TIME=now() where ID=#{id}
update WEBPORTAL_IMAGE set ISUSED=0 where ISUSED=1 and DICTIONARY_ID=#{dictionaryId} and PURPOSE=#{purpose};
mapper.select: select , dictionary.NAME DICTIONARY_NAME from WEBPORTAL_IMAGE image left join WEBPORTAL_DICTIONARY dictionary on image.DICTIONARY_ID=dictionary.ID where image.ID = #{id}

select count(1) from WEBPORTAL_IMAGE image left join WEBPORTAL_DICTIONARY dictionary on image.DICTIONARY_ID=dictionary.ID
and dictionary.NAME like CONCAT('%','${dictionaryName}','%') escape '^'

select , dictionary.NAME DICTIONARY_NAME from WEBPORTAL_IMAGE image left join WEBPORTAL_DICTIONARY dictionary on image.DICTIONARY_ID=dictionary.ID
and dictionary.NAME like CONCAT('%','${params.dictionaryName}','%') escape '^'
ORDER BY image.CREATE_TIME DESC
limit #{page.startRowPosition},#{page.recordsPerPage}
